original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, badges as b WHERE p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND b.UserId = c.UserId AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-19 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-10 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments

CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-19 00:00:00' AND CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-10 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1.PostId=E5.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E5.PostId=E3.RelatedPostId)
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5E3E6 AS SELECT * FROM E1E5E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E1E5E3.UserId=E6.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5E3E6E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1E5E3E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E5E3E6.PostId=E2.Id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5E3E6E2E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E5E3E6E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E5E3E6E2.PostId=E4.PostId)
